driveSystems
Class CaliforniaDrive

java.lang.Object
  driveSystems.DriveSystem
      driveSystems.CaliforniaDrive

public class CaliforniaDrive
extends DriveSystem

A class for a california drive. It cannot move sideways or move relative to the field.

Author:
Colin Poler
